DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 1860 If participate sexual activity could lead pregnancy , study volunteer must agree two reliable method contraception use simultaneously receive protocolspecified medication 1 month stop medication Men > 18 year . Serious illness require systemic treatment and/or hospitalization within 30 day prior entry .
